metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7191 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The netjoin processing in Irssi 1.x before 1.0.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) and possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7191` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.15-5ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0.8.21 and prior are not affected as per upstream

criterions.comment: irssi package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.15-5ubuntu3.1').
